properties.name: css.fonts
properties.v: @import url('//fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Montserrat');.sys_navigation, #sys_heading, div#heading_wrapper a, div#menu ul, H1, H2, H3, H4, H5, H6, #content h1, #content h2, #content h3, #content h4, #content h5, #content h6, #content_wrapper #content_inner_wrapper h1, #content_wrapper #content_inner_wrapper h2, #content_wrapper #content_inner_wrapper h3, #content_wrapper #content_inner_wrapper h4, #headline_wrapper a,div#menu ul li a, a#sys_heading, .decay, .decay-small, .ys_menu_2  {font-family: Montserrat;}.content, #content, .HTML_Default, .Text_Default, .sys_txt  {font-family: Georgia;}

properties.name: text
properties.v:
FARM FRESH QUALITY SINCE 1977

Fruits, vegetables and chickens happily coexist on our 75 acre certified organic family farm. You might have seen our farmstand at the farmer’s market, or maybe you’ve heard about our CSA.  It’s growing daily, with over 200 members opening their weekly box to delicious produce fresh from our farm.

properties.name: text
properties.v:
ALL ORGANIC

We’ve farmed organic since the day we planted our first heirloom tomatoes over 30 years ago. It’s good for the land, and it’s great for you. 

Learn More >

properties.name: text
properties.v:
THE RIGHT WAY

There’s a lot of buzz about sustainable farming, and we couldn’t be happier. We’ve seen how much richer the soil is when we control weeds, pests and disease without toxic chemicals. We’re pretty sure it makes our harvest taste better, too. 

Learn More >

properties.name: text
properties.v:
FARMED WITH LOVE

When we started to farm, it was just the two of us. Now we’ve got kids of our own and 10 employees who’ve become our extended family. We’re all here because we absolutely love what we do.

Learn More >

properties.name: text
properties.v:
GROWERFIELDS FARM

18073 Coleman Valley Rd
Occidental, CA 95465

Open Daily 9:30AM - 5:00PM
